About Us

Greatlance.com is the worldâ€™s best online servicing site where the employers can outsource their projects/jobs to any part of the world. Employers can find freelancers based on their expertise and get their work done through our secured Greatlance platform. Greatlance is a virtual office for expertise students, high rated professionals and small/mid sized companies where they get number of jobs/projects starting from web design, software development, writing, design etc. The best part of Greatlance is our online servicing team which comprises of the persons who are continuously working towards the fulfillment of the employersâ€™ need in payment conflict, project posting, project delivery and enriching freelancersâ€™ profile visibility.

Vision Our vision is to provide an accountable and a reliable Business Environment for every skilled professional to become a successful entrepreneur.

Mission Our mission is to give freelancers and employers a cutting edge platform where they can uplift the business to a new range of dimension with repeated jobs.

Core Principles of Greatlance Fairness : One of the most important principles of Greatlance team is to be fair with all customers in all type of transactions and services. Transparency : No false rating or false feedback, no false project or bid Security and Trust : Our Greatlance team is continuously monitoring the site for any false project display and false bid as well. Reliable and Cost Effective : Our team will continuously appreciate the best performance done by our freelancers. Example: We have newly introduced a concept of Premium Trusted Member where we measure the performance of freelancers on monthly basis and value them accordingly.

We Don’t Personal identification will not be revealed to any third party at any cost. We donâ€™t interfere in bidding process. Greatlance is not an agency or a recruitment service and we donâ€™t charge any recruitment fee. We never rate our profession by ourselves we leave this to the employers who rate them only after they are hired and paid. All the feedbacks you have seen are from the actual users.
